'''Blanche''' is a [[shop]] [[NPC]] in the [[City of Mondstadt]],[[Mondstadt]]. She is the shopkeeper of [[Mondstadt General Goods]], indicated by the {{DIcon|GeneralGoods}} icon on the map.

The shop is open at all times of the day and sells [[Cooking Ingredient|cooking ingredients]]. The stock refreshes every day.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Blanche:''' Hey there! We have quality goods at honest prices!
:{{DIcon|GeneralGoods}} What do you have for sale here?
::'''Blanche:''' Please have a look around.
:;(Opens [[Mondstadt General Goods]] wares)
:{{DIcon}} I'd like to ask about something.
::'''Blanche:''' I'm listening.
::{{DIcon}} What makes Mondstadt General Goods special?
:::'''Blanche:''' Our shop may be small, but we do have a warehouse in [[Liyue Harbor]].
:::'''Blanche:''' We take pride in having the largest catalogue of items and the fastest shipping in all of Mondstadt.
::{{DIcon}} What is Mondstadt known for?
:::'''Blanche:''' Mondstadt is a city known for its wines. Taverns are where you'd want to go.
:::'''Blanche:''' Most dwellers here go to one of the taverns for a drink after a hard day's work.
:::'''Blanche:''' You can meet all sorts of people in the taverns at night.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Blanche:''' Thank you for coming to Mondstadt General Goods. Be sure to visit again!
{{Dialogue end}}
